title: Tawny scrawny lion
creator_credit: Allan Frank Sandler, Zagreb Film and Sandler Institutional Films
brief_description: An animated cartoon about a scrawny lion who is always hungry and a rabbit who talks the lion out of eating all the other animals of the forest. The rabbit not only befriends the lion but finds a way to satisfy the lion’s hunger. Based on the book of the same title by Kathryn Jackson. Consultant Chuck Jones. Suitable for lower and middle primary levels.
